byline.original: By MAGGIE HABERMAN and THOMAS KAPLAN

headline.main: Donald Trump Suggests Hillary Clinton Isn’t ‘Loyal to Bill’

snippet: Mr. Trump commented on Mrs. Clinton’s marriage during a rally in Pennsylvania, plunging the presidential race further into a personal battle....
lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump commented on Mrs. Clinton’s marriage during a rally in Pennsylvania, plunging the presidential race further into a personal battle.
